author: __climber__
content: Do you think the risks around decentralized staking like RP are actually greater than the centralization risk from large exchanges? Or just for these specific kind of attacks?

author: sky.cactus
content: I think the risks are different, and it is really hard to identify which is worse.  I think what matters most is maximizing the number of people who operate validators and stake with their own money.

author: __climber__
content: It worries me if running a validator is the only solution. 32 Eth is prohibitive for most people and if anything that will probably get worse.

author: __climber__
content: 16 Eth casts a much wider net. I do understand the risk there though
